validation.notRecipeUrl: This URL doesn't appear to be from a recipe website, but we'll try to extract recipe content anyway.

tips.title: Tips for best results:
items: Use direct links to recipe pages, not search results or category pages
Popular recipe websites work best (AllRecipes, Food Network, etc.)
Processing may take 15-30 seconds depending on the website
Some websites may require multiple attempts due to rate limiting

tips.title: Tips for better results:
items: Ensure images are clear and well-lit
Make sure all text is readable
Drag and drop images to reorder pages
Supports both Hebrew and English text

guidance.chrome: In the print dialog, select "Save as PDF" as destination for best results.
guidance.firefox: Use "Print to File" and select PDF format. Some background colors may not print.
guidance.safari_mac: Click "PDF" in the print dialog and select "Save as PDF".

guidance.ie: Limited print support. Consider using a modern browser like Chrome or Edge for better results.
guidance.unknown: Look for "Save as PDF" or "Print to PDF" option in your browser's print dialog.
